DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Tickets
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets in Selected Period","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":16,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":32,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Critical","metricFieldValue":"DelayedCritical"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  jcl.Name as JobClassification,
        j.NameAndExternalId as Job,
        j.[State] as Stage,
        j.Project,
        iif(j.[State] in ('Open'), d.EntryDateUtc, j.[Date]) as Enddate,
        j.Oid,
        ISNULL(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color,
        DATEDIFF(day,getdate(),j.[Date]) as Days,
        DATEDIFF(day,j.ModifiedOn,getdate()) as LastActivity,
        sum(iif((jcl.Name in ('Urgent', 'Necessary', 'Important') and j.[Date] < getdate()), 1 ,0)) over() as DelayedCritical
from    Deliverable d,
        Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j,
        WorkflowState ws,
        WorkflowStateType wst,
        JobClassification jcl
where   ws.Oid = j.[StateId] and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        j.Oid = d.Oid and
        d.Classification = jcl.Oid and
        j.Department in ('Support','Client Service') and
        ((j.[State] in ('in Tests','Move to Production','on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install','Request Approval','Request more information')
        /*[DateFilter]*/ and j.[Date] >= @FromDate and j.[Date] <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/) or (j.[State] in ('Open')
        /*[DateFilter]*/ and d.EntryDateUtc >= @FromDate and d.EntryDateUtc <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/))","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Overtime View
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed, Critical and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":20,"WidgetRows":9,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2020/01/01","endDate":"2020/06/31","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  max(week) as week,
        [Day],
        iif(sum([Open]) = 0, null, max(sum(InProgress)) over() + sum([Open])) as [Open],
        sum(InProgress) as InProgress,
        iif(sum(Critical) = 0, null, max(sum(Closed)) over() + sum(Critical)) as Critical,
        sum(Closed) as Closed
from    (
                select  max(datepart(ww, d.EntryDateUtc)) as week,
                        min(cast(d.EntryDateUtc as date)) as [Day],
                        sum(iif(j.[State] = 'Open', 1, 0)) as [Open], 
                        0 as InProgress,
                        0 as Critical,
                        0 as Closed
                from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j,
                        Deliverable d, 
                        JobClassification jcl
                where   j.Oid = d.Oid and
                        d.Classification = jcl.Oid and
                        j.Department in ('Support', 'Client Service')  and
                        j.[State] in ('Canceled', 'Closed(Unrelated)', 'Closed', 'Open', 'in Tests', 'Move to Production', 'on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install', 'Request Approval', 'Request more information') and 
                        cast(d.EntryDateUtc as date) >= @FromDate and cast(d.EntryDateUtc as date) <= @ToDate
                group by datepart(yyyy, d.EntryDateUtc), datepart(ww, d.EntryDateUtc)
                union all
                select  max(datepart(ww, j.[Date])) as week,
                        min(cast(j.[Date] as date)) as [Day],
                        0 as [Open], 
                        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('in Tests','Move to Production','on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install', 'Request Approval', 'Request more information'), 1, 0)) as InProgress,
                        sum(iif(jcl.Name in ('Urgent', 'Necessary', 'Important') and j.[State] not in ('Closed', 'Canceled', 'Closed(Unrelated'), 1, 0)) as Critical,
                        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('Canceled', 'Closed(Unrelated)', 'Closed'), 1, 0)) as Closed
                from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j,
                        Deliverable d, 
                        WorkflowState ws, 
                        WorkflowStateType wst, 
                        Department dep,
                        JobClassification jcl
                where   d.Oid = j.Oid and
                        d.Classification = jcl.Oid and
                        j.Department in ('Support', 'Client Service')  and
                        j.[State] in ('Canceled', 'Closed(Unrelated)', 'Closed', 'Open', 'in Tests', 'Move to Production', 'on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install', 'Request Approval', 'Request more information') and 
                        cast(j.[Date] as date) >= @FromDate and cast(j.[Date] as date) <= @ToDate
                group by datepart(yyyy, j.[Date]), datepart(ww, j.[Date])
        ) t
group by [Day]
order by [Day]
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":null}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Tickets to Watch
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets from Client Service and Support by Stage","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":16,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Open","metricFieldValue":"OpenTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed","metricFieldValue":"DelayedTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Last Activity","metricFieldValue":"LastActivityTotall"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# RequestApproval","metricFieldValue":"RequestApprovalTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"# RequestMoreInfo","metricFieldValue":"RequestMoreInfoTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 'Open' as [Open],
        'Delayed' as Delayed,
        'Request Approval' as RequestApproval,
        'Request More Information' as RequestMoreInformation,
        'Last Activity' as LastActivity,
        0 as OpenTotal,
        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('in Tests','Move to Production','on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install') and j.[Date] < getdate(), 1, 0)) as DelayedTotal,
        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('Request Approval'), 1, 0)) as RequestApprovalTotal,
        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('Request more information'), 1, 0)) as RequestMoreInfoTotal,
        sum(iif((getdate() - j.ModifiedOn)>7,1,0)) as LastActivityTotal
    from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j,
            Deliverable d,
            WorkflowState ws,
            WorkflowStateType wst
    where   d.Oid = j.Oid and
            ws.Oid = j.StateId and
            wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
            j.Department in ('Support','Client Service') and
            j.[State] in ('Open', 'in Tests','Move to Production','on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install', 'Request Approval', 'Request more information')
    /*[DateFilter]*/ and (j.[Date] >= @FromDate and j.[Date] <= @ToDate and j.[State] not in ('Open'))/*[/DateFilter]*/
union all
select 'Open' as [Open],
        'Delayed' as Delayed,
        'Request Approval' as RequestApproval,
        'Request More Information' as RequestMoreInformation,
        'Last Activity' as LastActivity,
        sum(iif(j.[State] in ('Open'), 1, 0)) as OpenTotal,
        0 as DelayedTotal,
        0 as RequestApprovalTotal,
        0 as RequestMoreInfoTotal,
        0 as LastActivityTotal
from    Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j,
        Deliverable d,
        WorkflowState ws,
        WorkflowStateType wst,
        Department dep
where   ws.Oid = j.StateId and
        d.oid = j.Oid and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        j.Department in ('Support','Client Service') and
        j.[State] in ('Open', 'in Tests','Move to Production','on Hold', 'Request Uat', 'Requirement Approval', 'Under Analysis', 'To Install', 'Request Approval', 'Request more information')
/*[DateFilter]*/ and (d.EntryDateUtc >= @FromDate and d.EntryDateUtc <= @ToDate) /*[/DateFilter]*/","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate"]}}]
